title: Magnetism-induced diffuse scattering effect triggers excellent thermoelectric performance
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5216-5226
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01954G, Paper
Wei Song, Chuanqing Sun, Kangkang Yang, Shaoqiu Ke, Xiangyu Li, Mingrui Liu, Congli Sun, Wenyu Zhao, Qingjie Zhang
This work demonstrates a robust magnetism-induced diffuse scattering effect in improving the room-temperature thermoelectric performance.
